BLI_bitmap.h File Reference

Go to the source code of this file.

Defines

#define BLI_BITMAP_POWER   5
#define BLI_BITMAP_MASK   31
#define BLI_BITMAP_NUM_BLOCKS(_tot)   (((_tot) >> BLI_BITMAP_POWER) + 1)
#define BLI_BITMAP_SIZE(_tot)   (BLI_BITMAP_NUM_BLOCKS(_tot) * sizeof(unsigned int))
#define BLI_BITMAP_NEW(_tot, _alloc_string)
#define BLI_BITMAP_GET(_bitmap, _index)
#define BLI_BITMAP_SET(_bitmap, _index)
#define BLI_BITMAP_CLEAR(_bitmap, _index)
#define BLI_BITMAP_MODIFY(_bitmap, _index, _set)
#define BLI_BITMAP_RESIZE(_bitmap, _tot)   (_bitmap) = MEM_reallocN(_bitmap, BLI_BITMAP_SIZE(_tot))

  _index 
)
Value:

     ~(1 << ((_index) & BLI_BITMAP_MASK)))

  _index,
